mainText: The 1984 commercial still gives me chills.  Thank you, Steve, for what you accomplished first at Apple in the 1980's, then at Pixar, then again at Apple.  You proved that the computer revolution was indeed a PERSONAL computer revolution.  Then you gave us the greatest movie studio of our time.  Finally, you gave us the sleekest, funnest, most easy to use and apply computer devices that literally put the computer in the palm of all of our hands.  What a legacy.  Godspeed.
author: Gregory
